title: A Wizard of Dreams
description: alternate cover edition for ASIN: B00CKKHFCOBook 1: “A Wizard of Dreams” (65 chapters; 71,788 words) introduces you to Gordon Bennett, a boy born on 7th August 1999 with extraordinary powers. Where have those powers come from? Who – or what - is “Zack”...? His mother begins to notice when he is 5 months old. Key events indicate his powers are getting stronger...How does he deal with bullies? How about ghosts, fairies and wizards...?How seriously weird do things get around his eleventh birthday? And what’s his sixteen greats grandmother got to do with it...?Very few children get to go where he gets to go...Book 1 ends on 6th September 2010 – Gordon’s first morning in secondary school: when he finds out for certain that he’s not the only one. There’s a girl in the frame...This story will make you laugh quite a lot, but I warn you that in places it makes me cry... The Myrddin’s Heir series will challenge you. One of my most important questions, therefore, is: “Are YOU up for the challenge?”
author: Robin Chambers
